summary: A command‑line utility that transcribes audio files listed in a NeMo‑style manifest using a specified ASR model and then computes error metrics such as word error rate, character error rate, or punctuation error rate. It can also skip transcription and directly evaluate a manifest that already contains predicted transcriptions, optionally outputting per‑sample scores.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to automatically assess and benchmark the accuracy of speech‑to‑text models on custom datasets, facilitating quality control, model comparison, and reporting of transcription performance.
